F00000003304216292023030820240331017Q17 - CHRONIC ILLNESSES                                                                             Chronic illnesses
…Are you or any of your dependants currently taking regular, ongoing medicine, and/or are you receiving treatment for a medical condition or symptom not mentioned in the medical questionnaire?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Chroniese siektes
…Neem u of enige van u afhanklikes tans chroniese medisyne op ’n gereelde, onafgebroke basis en/of word u behandel vir ’n mediese toestand of simptoom wat nie in die mediese vraelys genoem is nie?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MHAP023  0101
F00000003314220062023030820240331H1 H1 - MEDICAL HISTORY                                                                                Have you or any of your dependants been admitted to hospital and/or diagnosed with an illness within the last 12 months prior to submitting this application?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Is u of u afhanklikes die afgelope 12 maande voor die indiening van hierdie aansoek in die hospitaal opgeneem en/of met 'n siekte gediagnoseer?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 MHAP023  0101
F00000003324216292023030820240331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* 
…
…Please note that if you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80. It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.                                                                                                                                                                                                            MIV/vigs
…Is u of enige van u afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?* 
…
…Neem kennis dat indien geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp u antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…*Indien u of enige van u afhanklikes verkies om nie u MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit u verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en op Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te skakel. Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van u lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons u aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal u ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskapdokument ontvang. …Hoë bloeddruk (hipertensie), hoë cholesterol, angina, borspyn, koronêre hartsiekte, hartaanval, stents, koronêre arterie omleidingchirurgie, palpitasies, aritmie, kortasemigheid, hartversaking, kardiomiopatie, valvulêre hartsiekte, hartklepvervanging, kongenitale hartsiekte, rumatiekkoors, vorige hartchirurgie, pasaangeër, aneurisme, arteriële siekte, chroniese veneuse ontoereikendheid, spatare, enige ander toestand wat die hart of bloedvate aantas.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             MHAP023  0202
F00000003594219222023030820240331009Q9 - BREATHING AND RESPIRATORY CONDITIONS                                                           Breathing and respiratory conditions
…Asthma, bronchitis, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema, bronchiectasis, tuberculosis, cystic fibrosis, sarcoidosis, pneumonia, pulmonary embolism, any other breathing or respiratory condition.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Asemhalings- en respiratoriese toestande

MHAP023  0202
F00000003704219222023030820240331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* 
…
…Please note that if you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80. It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.                                                                                                                                                                                                            MIV/vigs
…Is u of enige van u afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?* 
…
…Neem kennis dat indien geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp u antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…*Indien u of enige van u afhanklikes verkies om nie u MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit u verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en op Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te skakel. Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van u lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons u aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal u ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskapdokument ontvang.                                                                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0202

MHAP023  0101
F00000004004329022023030820240331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* 
…
…Please note that if you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80. It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.                                                                                                                                                                                                            MIV/vigs
…Is u of enige van u afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?* 
…
…Neem kennis dat indien geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp u antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…*Indien u of enige van u afhanklikes verkies om nie u MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit u verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en op Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te skakel. Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van u lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons u aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal u ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskapdokument ontvang.                                                                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0101

MHAP023  0103
F00000004234220062023090120240331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* 
…
…Please note that if you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80. It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.                                                                                                                                                                                                            MIV/vigs
…Is u of enige van u afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?* 
…
…Neem kennis dat indien geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp u antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…*Indien u of enige van u afhanklikes verkies om nie u MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit u verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en op Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te skakel. Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van u lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons u aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal u ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskapdokument ontvang. …                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Spinale-, been-, spier en verwante outo-immuun toestande. 
…Voorbeelde: pyn in die lae rug, nek of ruggraat, rumatoïede artritis, osteoartritis, knie-, heup of skouerprobleme of enige ander gewrigspyn, gewrigsvervangings, 
…ankiloserende spondilitis, lupus, jig, klompvoet, knokkels, Sjögren se sindroom, skleroderma, polimiositis, dermatomiositis, poliarteritis nodosa, fibromialgie, degeneratiewe 
…diskussiekte, skoliose, kifose, spinale stenose, frakture, fisiese gestremdheid, prostese, amputasie, enige ander outo-immuunsiektes wat die rug, bene of spiere aantas.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     MHAP023  0101
F00000004414216302023110120250331013Q13 - GYNAECOLOGICAL AND OBSTETRIC CONDITIONS                                                       Gynaecological and obstetric conditions
…Examples: abnormal Pap smear result, menstruation problems or abnormal bleeding, endometriosis, polycystic ovarian syndrome, infertility, ovarian cysts, ectopic 
…pregnancy, miscarriage, missed periods, conditions or complications related to pregnancy, emergency Caesarean section, any other gynaecological or obstetric condition.

F00000004464216302023110120250331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids 
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* Please note that if you do not make a selection, 
…Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the 
…Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80.
…It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, 
…we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                      MIV/vigs
…Is jy of enige van jou afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?Neem kennis dat as geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal 
…Medihelp jou antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…As jy of enige van jou afhanklikes verkies om nie julle MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit jou verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en 
…vir Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te bel.
…Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van jou lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons jou aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/ vigsprogram te 
…registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal jy ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskap-dokument ontvang.
…                                                                                                                                                                                  MHAP023  0101

…the next 12 months?

…volgende 12 maande kan lei?

…prosedures) vir enige toestand of siekte wat nie in die mediese vraelys genoem word nie (ingesluit enige beserings opgedoen by die huis, werk of in ’n voertuigverwante 
…ongeluk)?

…onder laaste opvolgdatum). Voorbeelde: bloedverwante kankersoorte, limfoom, leukemie, velletsels, vratte, moesies, borssiektes, fibrosistiese borssiekte, fibroadenoom,

…soos angiogramme, angioplastie en oorplantings).

…verteringsiekte.

F00000004724220072023110120250331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids 
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* Please note that if you do not make a selection, 
…Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the 
…Medihelp HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80.
…It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, 
…we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                      MIV/vigs
…Is jy of enige van jou afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?Neem kennis dat as geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal 
…Medihelp jou antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…
…As jy of enige van jou afhanklikes verkies om nie julle MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit jou verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en 
…vir Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te bel.
…Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van jou lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons jou aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/ vigsprogram te 
…registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal jy ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskap-dokument ontvang.
…                                                                                                                                                                                  MHAP023  0103

Spinale-, been-, spier en verwante outo-immuuntoestande
…Voorbeelde: pyn in die lae rug, nek of ruggraat, rumatoïede artritis, osteoartritis, knie-, heup of skouerprobleme of enige ander gewrigspyn, gewrigsvervangings, 
…ankiloserende spondilitis, lupus, jig, klompvoet, knokkels, Sjögren se sindroom, skleroderma, polimiositis, dermatomiositis, poliarteritis nodosa, fibromialgie, degeneratiewe 
…diskussiekte, skoliose, kifose, spinale stenose, frakture, fisiese gestremdheid, prostese, amputasie, enige ander outo-immuunsiektes wat die rug, bene of spiere aantas.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MHAP023  0202
F00000004904219232023110120250331013Q13 - GYNAECOLOGICAL AND OBSTETRIC CONDITIONS                                                       Gynaecological and obstetric conditions
…Examples: abnormal Pap smear result, menstruation problems or abnormal bleeding, endometriosis, polycystic ovarian syndrome, infertility, ovarian cysts, ectopic 
…pregnancy, miscarriage, missed periods, conditions or complications related to pregnancy, emergency Caesarean section, any other gynaecological or obstetric condition. …siste, ektopiese swangerskap, miskraam, ongereelde menstruasie, toestande of komplikasies in verband met swangerskap, noodkeisersnee, enige ander ginekologiese of 
…obstetriese toestand. MHAP023  0202
F00000004954219232023110120250331018Q18 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?* 
…
…Please note that if you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…
…*If any of your dependants prefer not to disclose their HIV status on this application form, you will remain responsible to inform the Scheme and to register on the Medihelp 
…HIV/Aids programme within 21 days from their enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80. It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible 
…termination of your dependants’ membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, we will determine whether underwriting conditions 
…must be applied and, if this is the case, issue an amended proof of membership document to you.                                                                                                                                                                                               MIV/vigs
…Is u of enige van u afhanklikes wat gemeld word op hierdie aansoekvorm MIV-positief of gediagnoseer met vigs?* 
…
…Neem kennis dat as geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp jou antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…*As jy of enige van jou afhanklikes verkies om nie julle MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, sal dit jou verantwoordelikheid bly om die Skema in kennis te stel en 
…vir Medihelp se MIV-/vigsprogram te registreer binne 21 dae vanaf die inskrywingsdatum deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te bel. Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te 
…verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van jou lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons jou aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV-/ vigsprogram te registreer, sal ons bepaal of 
…onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word en indien wel, sal jy ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskap-dokument ontvang.                                                                                                                                                                                   MHAP023  0202

…volgende 12 maande kan lei? …prosedures) vir enige toestand of siekte wat nie in die mediese vraelys genoem word nie (ingesluit enige beserings opgedoen by die huis, werk of in ’n voertuigverwante 
…ongeluk)? MHAP023 X0101
F00000005014216312024110120260331001Q1 - CANCER AND CANCEROUS GROWTHS                                                                   Cancer and cancerous growths
…Cancer or tumours of any organ or skin, including all stages of cancer, or historic cancer that is now in remission. Examples may include breast cancer, prostate cancer, 
…gastro-intestinal cancer, lung cancer, and skin cancer such as melanoma or basal cell carcinoma. Cancer also includes any blood-related cancers such as lymphoma, 
…leukaemia, aplastic anaemia, myeloma, myelodysplastic syndromes, or others. Cancer may have been diagnosed through abnormal test results, for example, abnormal 
…mammogram result, abnormal Pap smear result, abnormal prostate-specific antigen result, any other abnormal cancer screening, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Kanker en kankeragtige gewasse
…Kanker of gewasse van enige orgaan of vel, insluitend alle stadiums van kanker, of historiese kanker wat nou in remissie is. Voorbeelde kan borskanker, prostaatkanker, 
…gastro-intestinale kanker, longkanker en velkanker soos melanoom of basaalselkarsinoom insluit. Kanker sluit ook enige bloedverwante kankers in soos limfoom, leukemie, 
…aplastiese anemie, miëloom, miëlodisplastiese sindrome, of ander. Kanker is moontlik gediagnoseer deur abnormale toetsuitslae, byvoorbeeld abnormale 
…mammogramuitslag, abnormale Papsmeerresultaat, abnormale prostaatspesifieke antigeenresultaat, enige ander abnormale kankersifting, ens.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           MHAP023  0101

F00000005044216312024110120260331004Q4- MENTAL HEALTH (INCLUDING BEHAVIOUR DISORDERS, SUBSTANCE DEPENDENCY, AND OTHER PSYCHOSOCIAL CONDIMental health (including behaviour disorders, substance dependency, and other psychosocial conditions)
…Examples: depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety disorder, panic attacks, post-traumatic stress disorder, obsessive compulsive disorder, schizophrenia, personality disorders, 
…insomnia, sleeping disorders (for example, narcolepsy), eating disorders. Furthermore, examples include Alzheimer’s disease, dementia, as well as autism and attention 
…deficit hyperactivity disorder. Examples also include drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, rehabilitation for drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, suicide attempt(s), 
…counselling, or any other psychological condition. Admissions to any facility for the treatment of any mental health conditions, not limited to the examples mentioned above, 
…must be indicated in the column “indicate type of treatment” below.
…                                                                                                                                                                 Geestesgesondheid (insluitend gedragsversteurings, substansafhanklikheid en ander psigososiale toestande)
…Voorbeelde: depressie, bipolêre gemoedsteuring, angssteuring, paniekaanvalle, posttraumatiese stressteuring, obsessiewe-kompulsiewe steuring, skisofrenie, 
…persoonlikheidsteurings, slapeloosheid, slaapsteurings (byvoorbeeld narkolepsie), en eetsteurings. Verder sluit voorbeelde in Alzheimersiekte, demensie, asook outisme en 
…aandaggebrek-hiperaktiwiteitsteuring. Voorbeelde sluit ook dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, rehabilitasie vir dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, 
…selfdoodpoging(s), berading of enige ander sielkundige toestand in. Opnames in enige fasiliteit vir die behandeling van enige geestesgesondheidstoestande, nie beperk tot 
…die voorbeelde hierbo genoem nie, moet in die kolom “dui tipe behandeling aan” hier onder aangedui word.                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0101

…Examples: vision loss or impairment (partial or full blindness), cataracts, glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy, macular degeneration, retinal detachment, retinal vein occlusion,

F00000005074216312024110120260331007Q7 - EAR, NOSE AND THROAT CONDITIONS                                                                Ear, nose, and throat conditions

…eardrum, tonsillitis or enlarged tonsils, adenoid problems, dizziness, vertigo, tinnitus, blocked nose, sinus problems or allergies, any other ear, nose or throat condition, jaw 
…problems, and impacted teeth. Examples of procedures or devices include hearing aid, cochlear implant, nasal surgery, dental or orthodontic treatment, and dental surgery. 
…This may include any other anticipating or current orthodontic, dental, or maxillofacial treatment. F00000005084216312024110120260331008Q8 - HEART CONDITIONS AND HEART-OR PERIPHERAL RELATED CIRCULATION CONDITIONS                        Heart conditions and heart-or peripheral related circulation conditions
…Examples: high blood pressure (hypertension), high cholesterol, angina, chest pain, coronary heart disease, heart attack, heart failure, palpitations, arrhythmia, shortness of 
…breath, cardiomyopathy, aneurysm, valvular heart disease or heart murmurs, congenital heart disease, rheumatic fever, arterial disease, chronic venous insufficiency, 
…varicose veins, any other condition affecting the heart or blood vessels. Examples of procedures include stents, coronary artery bypass surgery, heart valve replacement, 
…previous heart surgery, pacemaker, any catheter-based vascular procedures like angiograms, angioplasty, and grafts. …Examples: asthma, bronchitis, chronic cough, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema, bronchiectasis, pneumonia, tuberculosis, interstitial lung disease, cystic

F00000005124216312024110120260331012Q12 -SPINAL, BONE, MUSCLE, AND RELATED AUTOIMMUNE CONDITIONS                                        Spinal, bone, muscle, and related autoimmune conditions
…Examples: knee, hip or shoulder problems or any other joint pain, tendon and soft tissue injuries, gout, clubfoot, bunions, osteoarthritis and procedures such as joint 
…replacements, prosthesis or removal of prosthesis, and amputation. Related auto-immune conditions may include rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, lupus gout, 
…Sjögren’s syndrome, scleroderma, polymyositis, polyarteritis nodosa, fibromyalgia, prosthesis, any other autoimmune conditions, any other condition affecting the back, 
…bones, or muscles.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Spinale, been-, spier- en verwante outo-immuuntoestande
…Voorbeelde: knie-, heup- of skouerprobleme of enige ander gewrigspyn, tendon- en sagteweefselbeserings, jig, klompvoet, knokkels, osteoartritis en prosedures soos 
…gewrigvervangings, prostese of verwydering van prostese en amputasie. Verwante outo-immuuntoestande kan rumatoïede artritis, ankiloserende spondilitis, lupus, jig, 
…Sjögren se sindroom, skleroderma, polimiositis, poliarteritis nodosa, fibromialgie, prostese, enige ander outo-immuuntoestande of enige ander toestand insluit wat die rug, 
…bene of spiere aantas.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      MHAP023  0101
F00000005134216312024110120260331013Q13 - GYNAECOLOGICAL CONDITIONS                                                                     Gynaecological conditions
…Examples: menstruation problems or abnormal bleeding, endometriosis, polycystic ovarian syndrome, myomas, cervical dysplasia or abnormalities, infertility, ovarian cysts, 
…any other gynaecological condition, or procedures that may include previous cervical biopsies (including cone biopsies and large loop excision of the transformation zone 
…procedures).
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Ginekologiese toestande
…Voorbeelde: menstruasieprobleme of abnormale bloeding, endometriose, polisistiese ovariële sindroom, miome, servikale displasie of abnormaliteite, onvrugbaarheid, 
…ovariële siste, enige ander ginekologiese toestand of prosedures wat vorige servikale biopsies kan insluit (insluitend kegelbiopsies en LLETZ-prosedures).
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      MHAP023  0101
F00000005144216312024110120260331014Q14 - PREGNANCY AND OBSTETRIC (PREGNANCY-RELATED) CONDITIONS                                        Pregnancy and obstetric (pregnancy-related) conditions
…Please confirm if you or any of your dependants are pregnant, if you or any of your dependants suspect that you are pregnant, or are undergoing testing for pregnancy. 
…Examples of pregnancy-related conditions also include ectopic pregnancy, miscarriage, missed periods, conditions or complications related to pregnancy, emergency 
…Caesarean section, etc.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Swangerskap en swangerskapsverwante toestande
…Bevestig asseblief of jy of enige van jou afhanklikes swanger is, as jy of enige van jou afhanklikes vermoed dat julle swanger is of toetse vir swangerskap ondergaan. 
…Voorbeelde van swangerskapverwante toestande sluit ook in ektopiese swangerskap, miskraam, menstruasie oorgeslaan, toestande of komplikasies wat verband hou met 
…swangerskap, noodkeisersnit, ens.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  MHAP023  0101
F00000005154216312024110120260331015Q15 - KIDNEY AND URINARY CONDITIONS                                                                 Kidney and urinary conditions
…Examples: kidney or renal failure, kidney stones, urinary incontinence, urinary tract infections, bladder infections, glomerulonephritis, nephrotic syndrome, polycystic kidney 
…disease, sexually transmitted diseases, any other kidney or bladder problems. Examples of procedures include acute or chronic renal dialysis, cystoscopy, stents, or any 
…other procedure related to your kidneys and urinary system.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Nier- en urinêre toestande
…Voorbeelde: nier- of nierversaking, nierstene, urinêre inkontinensie, urienweginfeksies, blaasinfeksies, glomerulonefritis, nefrotiese sindroom, polisistiese niersiekte, 
…seksueel oordraagbare siektes en enige ander nier- of blaasprobleme. Voorbeelde van prosedures sluit in akute of chroniese nierdialise, sistoskoop, stente of enige ander 
…prosedure wat verband hou met jou niere en urinêre stelsel.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0101
F00000005164216312024110120260331016Q16 - MALE URINARY AND GENITAL CONDITIONS                                                           Male urinary and genital conditions
…Examples: prostate disorders, enlarged prostate, chronic infection, urogenital defects, varicocele, tumours, undescended testes, phimosis, urinary incontinence, urinary 
…retention, and any other male urinary or genital condition. Examples of procedures include biopsies, transurethral resection of the prostate, hormone therapy for prostate 
…conditions, etc.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Urinêre en geslagstoestande by mans
…Voorbeelde: prostaattoestande, vergrote prostaat, chroniese infeksie, urogenitale defekte, spatare, gewasse, onafgedaalde testes, fimose, urinêre inkontinensie, urinêre 
…retensie en enige ander manlike urinêre of genitale toestand. Voorbeelde van prosedures sluit in biopsie, transuretrale reseksie van die prostaat, hormoonterapie vir 
…prostaattoestande, ens.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 MHAP023  0101
F00000005174216312024110120260331017Q17 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV-positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?*
…Please note: If you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you must still inform the Scheme and register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids 
…programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80.
…It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, 
…we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied. If underwriting conditions are applied, we will issue an amended proof of membership document to you.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                          MIV/Vigs
…Is jy of enige van jou afhanklikes wat op hierdie aansoekvorm genoem word MIV-positief of met Vigs gediagnoseer?*
…Neem kennis: As geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp jou antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…*As jy of enige van jou afhanklikes verkies om nie jul MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, moet jy die Skema steeds inlig en binne 21 dae vanaf jou 
…inskrywingsdatum vir Medihelp se MIV/Vigs-program registreer deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te bel.
…Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van jou lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons jou aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV/Vigs-program te 
…registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word. Indien wel, sal ons ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskap-dokument aan jou uitreik.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MHAP023  0101
F00000005184216312024110120260331018Q18 - CHRONIC OR REGULAR MEDICATION                                                                 Chronic or regular medication
…Please list all the medicine that you or your dependants have been using over the past 12 months.
…It also includes prescription medication or any other medication you have been using over a period of more than 30 days. This includes over-the-counter medicines, natural 
…or homeopathic medicines, etc.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Chroniese of gereelde medikasie
…Lys asseblief al die medisyne wat jy of jou afhanklikes oor die afgelope 12 maande gebruik het.
…Dit sluit in voorskrifmedikasie of enige ander medikasie wat jy oor ‘n tydperk van meer as 30 dae gebruik het. Dit sluit ook oor-die-toonbank-medisyne, natuurlike of 
…homeopatiese medisyne, ens in. …provide all relevant reports, referral letters, and relevant blood tests results.

…asseblief alle verslae, verwysingsbriewe en bloedtoetsuitslae aan wat daarmee verband hou. …accident. …toetse, X-strale, skanderings), daarmee gediagnoseer en/of daarvoor behandel (met of sonder prosedures)? Dit sluit enige beserings in wat by die huis, werk of in ’n 
…voertuigverwante ongeluk opgedoen is. MHAP023 X0103
F00000005244220082024110120260331001Q1 - CANCER AND CANCEROUS GROWTHS                                                                   Cancer and cancerous growths
…Cancer or tumours of any organ or skin, including all stages of cancer, or historic cancer that is now in remission. Examples may include breast cancer, prostate cancer, 
…gastro-intestinal cancer, lung cancer, and skin cancer such as melanoma or basal cell carcinoma. Cancer also includes any blood-related cancers such as lymphoma, 
…leukaemia, aplastic anaemia, myeloma, myelodysplastic syndromes, or others. Cancer may have been diagnosed through abnormal test results, for example, abnormal 
…mammogram result, abnormal Pap smear result, abnormal prostate-specific antigen result, any other abnormal cancer screening, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Kanker en kankeragtige gewasse
…Kanker of gewasse van enige orgaan of vel, insluitend alle stadiums van kanker, of historiese kanker wat nou in remissie is. Voorbeelde kan borskanker, prostaatkanker, 
…gastro-intestinale kanker, longkanker en velkanker soos melanoom of basaalselkarsinoom insluit. Kanker sluit ook enige bloedverwante kankers in soos limfoom, leukemie, 
…aplastiese anemie, miëloom, miëlodisplastiese sindrome, of ander. Kanker is moontlik gediagnoseer deur abnormale toetsuitslae, byvoorbeeld abnormale 
…mammogramuitslag, abnormale Papsmeerresultaat, abnormale prostaatspesifieke antigeenresultaat, enige ander abnormale kankersifting, ens.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           MHAP023  0103

F00000005274220082024110120260331004Q4- MENTAL HEALTH (INCLUDING BEHAVIOUR DISORDERS, SUBSTANCE DEPENDENCY, AND OTHER PSYCHOSOCIAL CONDIMental health (including behaviour disorders, substance dependency, and other psychosocial conditions)
…Examples: depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety disorder, panic attacks, post-traumatic stress disorder, obsessive compulsive disorder, schizophrenia, personality disorders, 
…insomnia, sleeping disorders (for example, narcolepsy), eating disorders. Furthermore, examples include Alzheimer’s disease, dementia, as well as autism and attention 
…deficit hyperactivity disorder. Examples also include drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, rehabilitation for drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, suicide attempt(s), 
…counselling, or any other psychological condition. Admissions to any facility for the treatment of any mental health conditions, not limited to the examples mentioned above, 
…must be indicated in the column “indicate type of treatment” below.
…                                                                                                                                                                 Geestesgesondheid (insluitend gedragsversteurings, substansafhanklikheid en ander psigososiale toestande)
…Voorbeelde: depressie, bipolêre gemoedsteuring, angssteuring, paniekaanvalle, posttraumatiese stressteuring, obsessiewe-kompulsiewe steuring, skisofrenie, 
…persoonlikheidsteurings, slapeloosheid, slaapsteurings (byvoorbeeld narkolepsie), en eetsteurings. Verder sluit voorbeelde in Alzheimersiekte, demensie, asook outisme en 
…aandaggebrek-hiperaktiwiteitsteuring. Voorbeelde sluit ook dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, rehabilitasie vir dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, 
…selfdoodpoging(s), berading of enige ander sielkundige toestand in. Opnames in enige fasiliteit vir die behandeling van enige geestesgesondheidstoestande, nie beperk tot 
…die voorbeelde hierbo genoem nie, moet in die kolom “dui tipe behandeling aan” hier onder aangedui word.                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0103

F00000005304220082024110120260331007Q7 - EAR, NOSE AND THROAT CONDITIONS                                                                Ear, nose, and throat conditions

F00000005314220082024110120260331008Q8 - HEART CONDITIONS AND HEART-OR PERIPHERAL RELATED CIRCULATION CONDITIONS                        Heart conditions and heart-or peripheral related circulation conditions
…Examples: high blood pressure (hypertension), high cholesterol, angina, chest pain, coronary heart disease, heart attack, heart failure, palpitations, arrhythmia, shortness of 
…breath, cardiomyopathy, aneurysm, valvular heart disease or heart murmurs, congenital heart disease, rheumatic fever, arterial disease, chronic venous insufficiency, 
…varicose veins, any other condition affecting the heart or blood vessels. Examples of procedures include stents, coronary artery bypass surgery, heart valve replacement, 
…previous heart surgery, pacemaker, any catheter-based vascular procedures like angiograms, angioplasty, and grafts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Harttoestande en hart- of perifere-verwante sirkulasietoestande
…Voorbeelde: hoë bloeddruk (hipertensie), hoë cholesterol, angina, borspyn, koronêre hartsiekte, hartaanval, hartversaking, hartkloppings, aritmie, kortasemrigheid, 
…kardiomiopatie, aneurisme, hartklepsiekte of hartgeruis, aangebore hartsiekte, rumatiekkoors, arteriële siekte, chroniese veneuse ontoereikendheid, spatare, of enige ander 
…toestand wat die hart of bloedvate aantas. Voorbeelde van prosedures sluit in stente, hartomleiding, hartklepvervanging, vorige hartchirurgie, pasaangeër en enige kateter-
…gebaseerde vaskulêre prosedures soos angiogramme, angioplastie en oorplantings. …Examples: asthma, bronchitis, chronic cough, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, emphysema, bronchiectasis, pneumonia, tuberculosis, interstitial lung disease, cystic 
…fibrosis, sarcoidosis, any other breathing or respiratory condition. If you work in a specific occupation or industry that may affect your lungs, please specify. …fibrose, sarkoïdose en enige ander asemhalings- of respiratoriese toestand. As jy in ‘n spesifieke beroep of bedryf werk wat jou longe kan beïnvloed, gee asseblief 
…besonderhede. F00000005334220082024110120260331010Q10 - ABDOMINAL AND DIGESTIVE CONDITIONS                                                            Abdominal and digestive conditions
…Examples: reflux, heartburn, hiatus hernia, hepatitis, Crohn’s disease, ulcerative colitis, irritable bowel syndrome or chronic bloatedness, cirrhosis, piles, fistulae or rectal

…stomach or duodenal ulcers, any hernia, digestive problems or malabsorption, diverticulitis, and any other abdominal or digestive condition. Examples of procedures may 
…include previous gastroscopy or colonoscopy.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Abdominale en verteringstoestande
…Voorbeelde: refluks, sooibrand, mantelvliesbreuk, hepatitis, Crohn se siekte, ulseratiewe kolitis, prikkelbaredermsindroom of chroniese opgeblaasdheid, sirrose, aambeie, 
…fistels of rektale bloeding, portale hipertensie, alkoholieselewersiekte, lewerversaking, hemochromatose, pankreatitis, sistiese fibrose, galblaastoestande, galstene, 
…slukdermsiekte, maag- of duodenumsere, enige breuk, spysverteringsprobleme of wanabsorpsie, divertikulitis en enige ander abdominale of spysverteringstoestand. 
…Voorbeelde van prosedures kan vorige gastroskopies of kolonoskopies insluit.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MHAP023  0103
F00000005344220082024110120260331011Q11 - SKIN CONDITIONS AND NON-CANCEROUS GROWTHS                                                     Skin conditions and non-cancerous growths
…Examples: abscesses, cysts, wounds, eczema, psoriasis, acne, sunspots, any non-cancerous lesions such as skin lesions, warts, moles, or any other conditions affecting 
…the skin.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Veltoestande
…Voorbeelde: absesse, siste, wonde, ekseem, psoriase, aknee, sonvlekke, enige niekankeragtige letsels soos velletsels, vratte, moesies of enige ander toestande wat die vel 
…aantas.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            MHAP023  0103
F00000005354220082024110120260331012Q12 -SPINAL, BONE, MUSCLE, AND RELATED AUTOIMMUNE CONDITIONS                                        Spinal, bone, muscle, and related autoimmune conditions
…Examples: knee, hip or shoulder problems or any other joint pain, tendon and soft tissue injuries, gout, clubfoot, bunions, osteoarthritis and procedures such as joint 
…replacements, prosthesis or removal of prosthesis, and amputation. Related auto-immune conditions may include rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, lupus gout, 
…Sjögren’s syndrome, scleroderma, polymyositis, polyarteritis nodosa, fibromyalgia, prosthesis, any other autoimmune conditions, any other condition affecting the back, 
…bones, or muscles.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Spinale, been-, spier- en verwante outo-immuuntoestande
…Voorbeelde: knie-, heup- of skouerprobleme of enige ander gewrigspyn, tendon- en sagteweefselbeserings, jig, klompvoet, knokkels, osteoartritis en prosedures soos 
…gewrigvervangings, prostese of verwydering van prostese en amputasie. Verwante outo-immuuntoestande kan rumatoïede artritis, ankiloserende spondilitis, lupus, jig, 
…Sjögren se sindroom, skleroderma, polimiositis, poliarteritis nodosa, fibromialgie, prostese, enige ander outo-immuuntoestande of enige ander toestand insluit wat die rug, 
…bene of spiere aantas.

…Examples: menstruation problems or abnormal bleeding, endometriosis, polycystic ovarian syndrome, myomas, cervical dysplasia or abnormalities, infertility, ovarian cysts,

F00000005374220082024110120260331014Q14 - PREGNANCY AND OBSTETRIC (PREGNANCY-RELATED) CONDITIONS                                        Pregnancy and obstetric (pregnancy-related) conditions
…Please confirm if you or any of your dependants are pregnant, if you or any of your dependants suspect that you are pregnant, or are undergoing testing for pregnancy. 
…Examples of pregnancy-related conditions also include ectopic pregnancy, miscarriage, missed periods, conditions or complications related to pregnancy, emergency 
…Caesarean section, etc.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Swangerskap en swangerskapsverwante toestande
…Bevestig asseblief of jy of enige van jou afhanklikes swanger is, as jy of enige van jou afhanklikes vermoed dat julle swanger is of toetse vir swangerskap ondergaan. 
…Voorbeelde van swangerskapverwante toestande sluit ook in ektopiese swangerskap, miskraam, menstruasie oorgeslaan, toestande of komplikasies wat verband hou met 
…swangerskap, noodkeisersnit, ens.

F00000005384220082024110120260331015Q15 - KIDNEY AND URINARY CONDITIONS                                                                 Kidney and urinary conditions
…Examples: kidney or renal failure, kidney stones, urinary incontinence, urinary tract infections, bladder infections, glomerulonephritis, nephrotic syndrome, polycystic kidney 
…disease, sexually transmitted diseases, any other kidney or bladder problems. Examples of procedures include acute or chronic renal dialysis, cystoscopy, stents, or any 
…other procedure related to your kidneys and urinary system.

…prosedure wat verband hou met jou niere en urinêre stelsel.

F00000005394220082024110120260331016Q16 - MALE URINARY AND GENITAL CONDITIONS                                                           Male urinary and genital conditions
…Examples: prostate disorders, enlarged prostate, chronic infection, urogenital defects, varicocele, tumours, undescended testes, phimosis, urinary incontinence, urinary

MHAP023  0103
F00000005404220082024110120260331017Q17 - HIV/AIDS                                                                                      HIV/Aids
…Are you or any of your dependants mentioned on this application HIV-positive or have you been diagnosed with Aids?*
…Please note: If you do not make a selection, Medihelp will regard your answer as “No”.
…*If you or any of your dependants prefer not to disclose your HIV status on this application form, you must still inform the Scheme and register on the Medihelp HIV/Aids 
…programme within 21 days from your enrolment date by phoning LifeSense on 0860 50 60 80.
…It is important to disclose this information to prevent the possible termination of your membership. When we receive your application to register on the HIV/Aids programme, 
…we will determine whether underwriting conditions must be applied. If underwriting conditions are applied, we will issue an amended proof of membership document to you.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                          MIV/Vigs
…Is jy of enige van jou afhanklikes wat op hierdie aansoekvorm genoem word MIV-positief of met Vigs gediagnoseer?*
…Neem kennis: As geen keuse gemaak word nie, sal Medihelp jou antwoord as “Nee” beskou.
…*As jy of enige van jou afhanklikes verkies om nie jul MIV-status op hierdie aansoekvorm te meld nie, moet jy die Skema steeds inlig en binne 21 dae vanaf jou 
…inskrywingsdatum vir Medihelp se MIV/Vigs-program registreer deur LifeSense by 0860 50 60 80 te bel.
…Dit is belangrik om hierdie inligting te verklaar om die moontlike beëindiging van jou lidmaatskap te verhoed. Sodra ons jou aansoek ontvang om vir die MIV/Vigs-program te 
…registreer, sal ons bepaal of onderskrywingsvoorwaardes toegepas moet word. Indien wel, sal ons ’n gewysigde Bewys van lidmaatskap-dokument aan jou uitreik.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MHAP023  0103

…Please list all the medicine that you or your dependants have been using over the past 12 months.
…It also includes prescription medication or any other medication you have been using over a period of more than 30 days. This includes over-the-counter medicines, natural 
…or homeopathic medicines, etc.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Chroniese of gereelde medikasie
…Lys asseblief al die medisyne wat jy of jou afhanklikes oor die afgelope 12 maande gebruik het.
…Dit sluit in voorskrifmedikasie of enige ander medikasie wat jy oor ‘n tydperk van meer as 30 dae gebruik het. Dit sluit ook oor-die-toonbank-medisyne, natuurlike of 
…homeopatiese medisyne, ens in. F00000005474219242024110120260331001Q1 - CANCER AND CANCEROUS GROWTHS                                                                   Cancer and cancerous growths
…Cancer or tumours of any organ or skin, including all stages of cancer, or historic cancer that is now in remission. Examples may include breast cancer, prostate cancer, 
…gastro-intestinal cancer, lung cancer, and skin cancer such as melanoma or basal cell carcinoma. Cancer also includes any blood-related cancers such as lymphoma, 
…leukaemia, aplastic anaemia, myeloma, myelodysplastic syndromes, or others. Cancer may have been diagnosed through abnormal test results, for example, abnormal 
…mammogram result, abnormal Pap smear result, abnormal prostate-specific antigen result, any other abnormal cancer screening, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Kanker en kankeragtige gewasse
…Kanker of gewasse van enige orgaan of vel, insluitend alle stadiums van kanker, of historiese kanker wat nou in remissie is. Voorbeelde kan borskanker, prostaatkanker, 
…gastro-intestinale kanker, longkanker en velkanker soos melanoom of basaalselkarsinoom insluit. Kanker sluit ook enige bloedverwante kankers in soos limfoom, leukemie, 
…aplastiese anemie, miëloom, miëlodisplastiese sindrome, of ander. Kanker is moontlik gediagnoseer deur abnormale toetsuitslae, byvoorbeeld abnormale 
…mammogramuitslag, abnormale Papsmeerresultaat, abnormale prostaatspesifieke antigeenresultaat, enige ander abnormale kankersifting, ens.
…                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           MHAP023  0202

F00000005504219242024110120260331004Q4- MENTAL HEALTH (INCLUDING BEHAVIOUR DISORDERS, SUBSTANCE DEPENDENCY, AND OTHER PSYCHOSOCIAL CONDIMental health (including behaviour disorders, substance dependency, and other psychosocial conditions)
…Examples: depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety disorder, panic attacks, post-traumatic stress disorder, obsessive compulsive disorder, schizophrenia, personality disorders, 
…insomnia, sleeping disorders (for example, narcolepsy), eating disorders. Furthermore, examples include Alzheimer’s disease, dementia, as well as autism and attention 
…deficit hyperactivity disorder. Examples also include drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, rehabilitation for drug or alcohol dependency or abuse, suicide attempt(s), 
…counselling, or any other psychological condition. Admissions to any facility for the treatment of any mental health conditions, not limited to the examples mentioned above, 
…must be indicated in the column “indicate type of treatment” below.
…                                                                                                                                                                 Geestesgesondheid (insluitend gedragsversteurings, substansafhanklikheid en ander psigososiale toestande)

…persoonlikheidsteurings, slapeloosheid, slaapsteurings (byvoorbeeld narkolepsie), en eetsteurings. Verder sluit voorbeelde in Alzheimersiekte, demensie, asook outisme en 
…aandaggebrek-hiperaktiwiteitsteuring. Voorbeelde sluit ook dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, rehabilitasie vir dwelm- of alkoholafhanklikheid of -misbruik, 
…selfdoodpoging(s), berading of enige ander sielkundige toestand in. Opnames in enige fasiliteit vir die behandeling van enige geestesgesondheidstoestande, nie beperk tot 
…die voorbeelde hierbo genoem nie, moet in die kolom “dui tipe behandeling aan” hier onder aangedui word.                                                                                                                                               MHAP023  0202

…Examples: vision loss or impairment (partial or full blindness), cataracts, glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy, macular degeneration, retinal detachment, retinal vein occlusion,
